- 26 hours ago Dan Graham
    0f11430d 2020-05-12 09:41:16 -0400
    Added M (month) to period string. Added datetime shortcuts daybeg,
    ... monthend. Added option to use +/- period strings in -b and -e
    query specifications. Completed use of earlier and later in -b and
    -e entries to avoid date vs datetime errors.

- 12 days ago Dan Graham
    2f180008 2020-05-01 13:02:16 -0400
    Replaced 'c' with 's' (start|finished) time and added 'm'
    (modified|created) time and 'c' (created) time to the complex
    query date specifications to join 'u' (usedtime) time.

- 4 weeks ago Dan Graham
    35f7cc36 2020-04-14 15:34:11 -0400
    Apply vi_mode setting only to the entry buffer for new, copy and
    existing items. Display modified state using + for all edit
    settings. Fix the heights for the reply and entry areas to avoid
    distracting height changes with cursor movement. Use original vs
    current buffer content to determine whether content modified and
    apply this to unsaved changes prompt as well as '+'.

- 6 weeks ago Dan Graham
    00cb8757 2020-04-04 14:04:26 -0400
    Many fixed for -a entries including tags, location, usedtime. Use
    finished_char as itemtype when f is in item. Used hours_and_tenths
    uniformly. Replaced various print statements with logger.debug or
    logger.error. Initial work on query help and README. Implemented
    'queries' in option settings and when entering a valid key,
    pasting the correspond value into the entry field for optional
    modification and to join the command history.
